definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: He took to safe that removed the list.
sentences.chinese: 他带着晓阳去保险柜里取出了名单。

sentences.english: One is inside the safe in front ofu.
sentences.chinese: 有一个就在你们面前的保险柜里。

sentences.english: How did the thieves learn the combination used to open the safe ?
sentences.chinese: 窃盗们如何晓得用以开保险柜的暗码？

sentences.english: The robbers clobbered the shopkeeper to make him open the safe.
sentences.chinese: 强盗们殴打店主迫使他打开保险柜。

sentences.english: though they went after my safe with a sledgehammer, they'd failed to open it.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他们动用大锤，也没有打开我的保险柜。

sentences.english: He locked up his diamonds in a safe.
sentences.chinese: 他把钻石锁藏在保险柜里。

sentences.english: I would like to store my laptop in one of your safe-deposit boxes.
sentences.chinese: 我想把我的笔记本电脑存放在酒店的保险柜里。

sentences.english: You cannot buy an uncrackable safe.
sentences.chinese: 砸不开的保险柜也是买不到的。

sentences.english: The uncounted money is in the safe.
sentences.chinese: 没数过的钱在保险柜里。

sentences.english: He went back to the safe and put his hand on the knob.
sentences.chinese: 他回到保险柜旁，把手放在锁钮上。

sentences.english: They terrified her into handing over the key to the safe.
sentences.chinese: 他们恐吓她，使她交出了保险柜的钥匙。

sentences.english: Patty locks the envelope into a safe.
sentences.chinese: 派蒂将信封锁在了一个保险柜里。

sentences.english: You don't have a refrigerator or cabinets to store any items.
sentences.chinese: 因为您没有用来储存食物的冰箱或保险柜。

sentences.english: The special-purpose safe, prevents the factory field handling crew and the play family from indulging in corrupt practices.
sentences.chinese: 专用保险柜，防止厂地管理人员及玩家作弊。

sentences.english: The Elmore Bank had just put in a new safe and vault.
sentences.chinese: 爱尔摩银行刚刚装建了一个新保险柜和地下室。

sentences.english: She locked all her valuables in a safe.
sentences.chinese: 她把所有贵重物品都锁在保险柜里。
